item.title: Building Settings Pages
item.description: Creating WordPress Settings pages with Piklist is as easy as creating any other field type. First we register the Settings page, and then we start adding Settings sections. Piklist uses the standard WordPress settings API, plus it adds extra power and ease of use. You can use any Piklist field type on a Settings page, and easily add Tabs as well. In this tutorial, we will create a Settings Page that includes three fields: select, text and colorPicker, with tooltip help.
